WRITING.TITLE: What J.F. Kennedy has done as a president?
WRITING.TEXT: I know some things about him bu I would like to know some more infos about him. I know about the crisis of the rackets in Cuba and he fought for the liberties of black people, I know that he was very smart like he had IQ 150, smarter then Einstein.

The mountain hunters are looking for the enemy where is it and they ( mountain hunters ) inform the superiors about the situation. From what my grandmother and my mother said: they are kind of snipers sometimes but when the enemy comes, mountain hunters have to fight like body to body. It's kind of strange but it's hard to be something like that because you need some patience. Hope you understand bro!
British made a lot of bad things in my opinion... they bombed Dresden and killed like 80.000 civilians... Dresden was not a military target

He was a soldier in Romanian Army. He was captured by the russians and they sent him in Siberia in Celabinski or something like that ( that's the name of concentration camp ) from what I know it was a secret concentration camp. But by the time USSR said some things about those concentration camps who were secret.
He was romanian ( don't judge me ) . He was in kind of concentration camp... and it was terrible

Yes, I posted up but I will paste it: My great grandfather fought in ww2 and he died in 1986 unfrotunately, but I havent known him because I was born like 15 yrs after he died, but my mom said about him a lot of good things, and she said that my great grandfather was very kind with others. When he ( ggf ) got high fever, he started to tell about the war, like how the russians treated him and stuff like that. He was a prisoner in a camp named Celabinski or something like that in Russia and he said that he survived after he drunk water of the dead bodies and he came with a train for animals. P.S: His brother died when he was 18 yrs old in Russia or Ukraine.
My grandfather had a hard time in Russia... he lost his brother there and he was 'mountain hunter' yes it sounds very weird but it's a very important thing in army.

I understand man!
